headline: Is It Time To Reconsider Eversource Energy (ES) After Its Recent Share Price Recovery
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether Eversource Energy is attractively priced right now, the recent share performance and a fresh look at fair value are a good place to start. The stock most recently closed at US$74.87, with returns of 2.1% over 7 days, 7.6% over 30 days, 10.0% year to date, 24.5% over 1 year, 11.0% over 3 years and 12.3% over 5 years. This provides multiple data points for thinking about value and risk. Recent news has continued to focus on Eversource Energy's position...
